metadata.synopsis: Backup zhent leaderl finds that most of her men are dead, and decides against attacking the Guild.

0.speaker: Trinoda
0.text: Shite. What the hells happened to the crew? May need to change tack...
0.context: NodeContext: Thrown - you've showed up for a coup only to find your crews dead / dying - you can't go ahead with it
